item.title: Install Steam on Ubuntu 12.04
item.description: Download steam_latest.deb at: http://repo.steampowered.com/steam/archive/precise/steam_latest.deb Double click and open it on Ubuntu Software Center and click Install It’ll start Terminal and ask password for sudo because there are some packages required, enter your password and continue Next it’ll update itself Done Source
